attributes.action: banning Shamima Begum from returning to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Shamima Begum, 19, did not say she regretted joining ISIS but pleaded with her family to keep trying to get her back to the UK.

The British ISIS bride Shamima Begum says she is ‘not dangerous’ and fears her newborn son will die in the Syrian camp where she is being held. The only reason she wants to come home is due to ISIS have lost. 

Us the people of the UK do not want her back. As we have made it quite clear on all social media outlets
attributes.background:
banning Shamima Begum from returning to the UK.

She is an ISIS member, we should be removing her citizenship and passports it would help keep the UK safe from terrorists and their actions. 

It would also send a message to others that membership of terrorist orgsnisation will not be tollerated
